# EKStructuredLocation

**Class**

`A` class that specifies a geofence to activate the alarm of a calendar item.

## Declaration

```swift
class EKStructuredLocation
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKStructuredLocation/init(title:)] to create a new structured location, then set it to the [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/structuredLocation] property of an [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm] object.

## Creating Structured Locations

- **init(title:)**: Creates a new structured location with the specified title.
- **init(mapItem:)**: Creates a new structured location with the specified map item.

## Accessing Structured Location Properties

- **title**: The title of the location.
- **geoLocation**: The core location.
- **radius**: A minimum distance from the core location that would trigger the alarm or reminder.

## Alarms

- **Setting an alarm**: Alert users of events and reminders with an alarm.
- **EKAlarm**: A class that represents an alarm.

## Inherits From

- EKObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
